database.name: massive
database.description: The Massive Database contains information about all the proteomics/metabolomics datasets in massive

entry.name: GNPS Ferrioxamines and producing organism Micromonospora sp FI1001
entry.description: Extracts from FI1001 found to produce ferrioxamine derivatives previously reported by Sidebottom et al (ACS Chem Biol 2013, PMID: 23777274), compounds verified based on reported MS/MS patterns in SI. FI1001 extracts and strain information reported by Sanchez et al (Plos ONE 2012, PMID: 22574119).
